text:
Hi guys,

Does anyone know how to remove this problem? For one website built on HubSpot, Google Search Console registers these two URLs as 'Not found (404)'., even though those pages don't exist at all. We did a validation through the Google Search Console, but the validation failed.

_hcms/perf
hubfs/Featured

Reminder: HubSpot has an <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/seo/view-seo-recommendations-in-HubSpot|SEO recommendations tool> built into HubSpot that helps you track down issues and suggests changes you can make.
Hi there Endrit, thank you for the question. Have you tried updating your robots.txt file yet?
â€¦ and check the sitemap? Google does not rescan your website on a daily basis so the problem might disappear automatically
